intro: Celmisia laricifolia, commonly known as the silver tree, is a flowering plant native to New Zealand. It belongs to the Asteraceae family and is characterized by its distinctive silver-green foliage. The plant produces small, daisy-like flowers that bloom in spring, typically in shades of white and yellow. It thrives in cool, moist environments and is often found in forested areas. Due to its unique appearance and ecological significance, it is a valued species in New Zealand's flora.
